title: Leave Buster
body: to be honest the leave buster is very punishing and very strict but my account is being busted for leaving on an AI game because i had to Skype my grandparents. i think you guys should maybe make it so you dont get baned if you leave an AI game but when you go into a PVP game lobby you get a pop up that says "Warning in this mode you CAN get Leave Busted are you sure you WILL NOT leave the game?"(also remaining AFK WILL be punished) maybe you could do that or make the leave buster a bit more strict ON PVP games only and remove it from AI games. just consider it please. ty

replies.body: While it was only a Co-Op vs AI match, the other players on your team could have still been affected by that leave. I hate that you ended up getting this low priority queue because you had an IRL matter to attend to, which is more important of course, but we still need to help protect the integrity of the game and try to influence people to not leave matches so often.

i understand that you want to make it so people dont leave mid game. and i know you are working hard to do so, maybe you could make is so in pvp games you get busted every 3 games and in AI you get busted every 5 games. ty
Stop going afk in PVP Matches how about trying that
i dont im trying to stop people FROM going afk in pvp matches
